pages.title: Antibodies in the Lu Lab
pages.text: Primary antibodiesIba1Wako No.019-19741Preparation: Purified by the antigen affinity chromatography from rabbit antisera and prepared in TBS solution. Contains no preservatives and stabilizers.Specifity: Specific to microglia and macrophage, but not cross-reactive with neuron and astrocyte.  Reactive with human, mouse and rat Iba1.Working Concentration: Immunocytochemistry 1-2 ��g/mL    Immunohistochemistry 0.5-1��g/mLStroge: Keep at -20��
